column1: [Wojnarowski] The Pacers have signed forward Oshae Brissett to a three-year deal, source tells ESPN.
Oshae Brissett in tonight's win vs. the Thunder: 23 points, 12 rebounds, 1 assist, 2 steals, and 3 blocks
Oshae Brissett with 18 points 10 rebounds and an insane 5 blocks against Portland
Since starting for the Indiana Pacers, Oshae Brissett is averaging 15.5/10/2blk and shooting 45% from 3.
Oshae Brissett records a double-double with 31 points and 10 rebounds in a win against the Toronto Raptors
